Text: Bro can you please put up 7x10 - Season 7 Finale Katy Perry Challenge separately i got all the other episodes. the other uploader is slacking

@lucien1915
If you open the torrent file in your client you can select which file you would like and which you don't. In Vuze it's done by unselecting ToolsOptionsFilesAutomatically download to default directory (no prompt).
thanks alot, ur the man im getting it now and i just learnt something new about vuze, shot bro
